message: The SOURCE_TYPE field for indicator 8-1-3, translated into en
data:
The indicator Gross domestic product per capita is calculated from various sources, specifically:

- Gross domestic product: Data source as the data source of indicator 8.1.1;

- Population and housing census;

- Census midterm;

- Population change and family planning survey;

- The annual average VND/USD exchange rate, purchasing power parity rate announced by the General Statistics Office based on the report of the State Bank and the United Nations Statistical Organization.
